sprint_goal: Establish the project foundation, create the core database schema, and implement the user registration endpoint.
Enable the full user activation and login flow, establishing the core authentication loop.
Containerize the application, implement secure logout with session invalidation, and deliver the password reset flow.
Implement account deactivation/reactivation and establish the security audit logging framework.
Deliver the Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) setup flow.
Integrate MFA into the login flow and implement the permanent account deletion request and cancellation mechanism.
Automate the CI/CD pipeline and fully instrument the application for production observability.
Define and implement the production infrastructure as code using Terraform for automated Kubernetes deployments.
